comment:
This was a custom, extensive and large project with many different parts and various integrations. Jay completed the project to original description and we are very satisfied with the result.

Originally quoted by Jay to take around 10 days the project took nearly 3 months. While some of the extended time was understandable as the project unfolded due to the complexity and strict specs and we happily gave extensions for those things, there was several periods of unexplaned time were Jay was unresponsive and did not appear to be working on the project. That was unacceptable.

More clear communication would have significantly improved this experience.
